page.title: 05The Post Office
page.content:
The history of the Post Office started a long time ago. It used to be in a cottage across the road from its present site. The present day building was erected in 1872. The post office has changed quite a lot. It is now twice as big as it ever was and serves a lot more customers. We think that running it must be very hard work.
{Mr King}is the{present owner}of this {combined shop and post office,}he works 13 hours each weekday. It would be a great shame if ever the post office had to close because it helps to characterise our village,{provides {employment} as well as being an {essential service} and is also an excellent general store.
